metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7751 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The svg_probe function in libavformat/img2dec.c in FFmpeg through 3.4.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Infinite Loop) via a crafted XML file.

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mythtv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
